description: This file is a CMake script used to locate and configure the bcm_host library, importing its include directories, compile options, and linking settings, and defining related package variables and targets.
calls: set_target_properties(BCM_HOST::BCM_HOST PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LANGUAGES "C" IMPORTED_LOCATION "${BCM_HOST_LIBRARY}" INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "PLATFORM_RPI" INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS "${PC_BCM_HOST_CFLAGS_OTHER}" INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${PC_BCM_HOST_INCLUDE_DIRS}" INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES "${PC_BCM_HOST_LIBRARIES}")
